description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A story based 2D puzzle-Platformer.  David, a musician with synesthesia has fallen into a coma and can’t remember anything. Help David traverse his dream-like coma and bring back his memories by solving puzzles, collecting items and navigating levels.
description.short: A story based 2D puzzle-Platformer.  David, a musician with synesthesia has fallen into a coma and can’t remember anything. Help David traverse his dream-like coma and bring back his memories by solving puzzles, collecting items and navigating levels.
